mapper.select:
SELECT rownum as seq, e.* FROM ( SELECT BBI_DOCNO, BBI_BBSTYPE, BBI_TIT, BBI_OPEN_YN, BDA_CMNT, FN_GETUSERID_TO_NAME(BZ_BBS_INFO.CMN_MAK_ID) AS CMN_MAK_NAME, BZ_BBS_INFO.CMN_MAK_ID AS CMN_MAK_ID, to_char(BZ_BBS_INFO.CMN_MAK_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CMN_MAK_DATE, to_char(BZ_BBS_INFO.CMN_UPD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CMN_UPD_DATE, FN_GETCOMCODE_CLS3NAME ('100', '112', BBI_MANUALTYPE) as BBI_MANUALTYPE FROM BZ_BBS_INFO LEFT OUTER JOIN BZ_DATA_ATCH ON BDA_DocNo = BBI_DOCNO AND BDA_BzCls1 = 'BIZ_M' AND BDA_BzSeqNo = '1' WHERE BZ_BBS_INFO.CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND BBI_BBSTYPE = '1' AND (BZ_BBS_INFO.CMN_MAK_ID = #{USER_ID} OR BBI_OPEN_YN = 'Y')
AND BBI_TIT LIKE '%' || #{SeqTEXT} || '%'
AND BBI_CTNT LIKE '%' || #{SeqTEXT} || '%'
order by BZ_BBS_INFO.CMN_MAK_DATE desc ) e

SELECT rownum as seq, e.* FROM ( SELECT BBI_DOCNO, BBI_BBSTYPE, BBI_TIT, BBI_OPEN_YN, BBI_SELECT_CNT, FN_GETUSERID_TO_NAME(CMN_MAK_ID) AS CMN_MAK_NAME, CMN_MAK_ID, to_char(CMN_MAK_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CMN_MAK_DATE, to_char(CMN_UPD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CMN_UPD_DATE, FN_GETCOMCODE_CLS3NAME ('100', '113', BBI_MANUALTYPE) as BBI_MANUALTYPE FROM BZ_BBS_INFO WHERE BZ_BBS_INFO.CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND BBI_BBSTYPE = '2' AND (CMN_MAK_ID = #{USER_ID} OR BBI_OPEN_YN = 'Y')
AND BBI_TIT LIKE '%' || #{SeqTEXT} || '%'
AND BBI_CTNT LIKE '%' || #{SeqTEXT} || '%'
order by BBI_MANUALTYPE, CMN_MAK_DATE desc ) e

SELECT BBI_DOCNO, BBI_BBSTYPE, BBI_TIT, decode(BBI_OPEN_YN, 'Y', '공개','비공개') as BBI_OPEN_YN, BBI_OPEN_YN AS OPEN_CODE, BBI_SELECT_CNT, BBI_CTNT,
FN_GETCOMCODE_CLS3NAME('100', '112', BBI_MANUALTYPE) AS BBI_MANUALTYPE, BBI_MANUALTYPE AS BBI_MANUALTYPE_CODE,
FN_GETCOMCODE_CLS3NAME('100', '113', BBI_MANUALTYPE) AS BBI_MANUALTYPE, BBI_MANUALTYPE AS BBI_MANUALTYPE_CODE,
FN_GETUSERID_TO_NAME(CMN_MAK_ID) AS CMN_MAK_NAME, to_char(CMN_MAK_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CMN_MAK_DATE FROM BZ_BBS_INFO WHERE BBI_DOCNO = #{BBI_DOCNO}

SELECT BBC_SEQ, BBC_CTNT, BZ_BBS_CMNT.CMN_MAK_ID AS CMN_MAK_ID, FN_GETUSERID_TO_NAME(BZ_BBS_CMNT.CMN_MAK_ID) AS CMN_MAK_NAME, FN_GETDPTNAME(MUI_TEAMNO) AS TEAMNO, to_char(BZ_BBS_CMNT.CMN_MAK_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CMN_MAK_DATE FROM BZ_BBS_CMNT, MF_USER_INFO WHERE BZ_BBS_CMNT.CMN_MAK_ID = MUI_ID AND BBC_DOCNO = #{value} order by BZ_BBS_CMNT.CMN_MAK_DATE desc

SELECT BDA_DOCNO, BDA_BZSEQNO, BDA_BZDATE, BDA_CNTNTTYPE, BDA_ATCHFILE, BDA_CMNT, case when BDA_UPPATH like 'AddDoc%' then UploadPath || 'AddDoc/' when not BDA_UPPATH like '%AddDoc%' then BDA_UPPATH || 'AddDoc/' else BDA_UPPATH end as BDA_UPPATH from (SELECT BDA_DOCNO, BDA_BZCLS1, BDA_BZCLS2, BDA_BZCLS3, BDA_BZSEQNO, BDA_BZDATE, BDA_CNTNTTYPE, BDA_ATCHFILE, BDA_CMNT, CASE when BDA_UPPATH like '%/' or BDA_UPPATH like '%\' then BDA_UPPATH else BDA_UPPATH || '/' end as BDA_UPPATH FROM BZ_DATA_ATCH), (SELECT CASE when MSC_UploadPath like '%/' or MSC_UploadPath like '%\' then MSC_UploadPath else MSC_UploadPath || '/' end as UploadPath FROM MF_SYS_CTRL WHERE MSC_SeqNo = '1') WHERE BDA_DOCNO = #{BDA_DOCNO} AND BDA_BZCLS1 = #{BDA_BZCLS1} order by BDA_BZSEQNO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BZ_DATA_ATCH(BDA_DOCNO, BDA_BZCLS1, BDA_BZCLS2, BDA_BZCLS3, BDA_BZSEQNO, BDA_BZDATE, BDA_CNTNTTYPE, BDA_UPPATH, BDA_ATCHFILE, BDA_CMNT, CMN_DEL_STS, CMN_MAK_DATE, CMN_MAK_PROG, CMN_MAK_ID, CMN_UPD_DATE, CMN_UPD_PROG, CMN_UPD_ID) VALUES(#{BDA_DOCNO}, #{BDA_BZCLS1}, #{BDA_BZCLS2}, #{BDA_BZCLS3}, #{BDA_BZSEQNO}, SYSDATE, #{BDA_CNTNTTYPE}, #{BDA_UPPATH}, #{BDA_ATCHFILE}, #{BDA_CMNT}, 'N', SYSDATE, #{CMN_MAK_PROG}, #{CMN_MAK_ID}, SYSDATE, #{CMN_UPD_PROG}, #{CMN_UPD_ID})

INSERT INTO BZ_BBS_INFO(BBI_DOCNO, BBI_BBSTYPE, BBI_MANUALTYPE, BBI_TIT, BBI_OPEN_YN, BBI_CTNT, BBI_SELECT_CNT, CMN_DEL_STS, CMN_MAK_DATE, CMN_MAK_PROG, CMN_MAK_ID, CMN_UPD_DATE, CMN_UPD_PROG, CMN_UPD_ID) VALUES(#{BBI_DOCNO}, #{BBI_BBSTYPE}, #{BBI_MANUALTYPE}, #{BBI_TIT}, #{BBI_OPEN_YN}, #{BBI_CTNT}, '0', 'N', SYSDATE, 'biz0202', #{CMN_MAK_ID}, SYSDATE, 'biz0202', #{CMN_UPD_ID})

INSERT INTO BZ_BBS_CMNT(BBC_SEQ, BBC_DOCNO, BBC_CTNT, CMN_DEL_STS, CMN_MAK_DATE, CMN_MAK_PROG, CMN_MAK_ID, CMN_UPD_DATE, CMN_UPD_PROG, CMN_UPD_ID) VALUES((select nvl(max(TO_NUMBER(BBC_SEQ)),'0')+1 from BZ_BBS_CMNT), #{BBC_DOCNO}, #{BBC_CTNT}, 'N', SYSDATE, 'biz0202', #{CMN_MAK_ID}, SYSDATE, 'biz0202', #{CMN_UPD_ID})
mapper.update: update BZ_BBS_CMNT set BBC_CTNT = #{BBC_CTNT}, CMN_UPD_DATE = SYSDATE, CMN_UPD_PROG = 'biz0202', CMN_UPD_ID = #{CMN_UPD_ID} where BBC_SEQ = #{BBC_SEQ} and BBC_DOCNO = #{BBC_DOCNO}

update BZ_BBS_INFO SET BBI_TIT = #{BBI_TIT}, BBI_OPEN_YN = #{BBI_OPEN_YN}, BBI_CTNT = #{BBI_CTNT}, CMN_UPD_DATE = SYSDATE, CMN_UPD_PROG = 'biz0202', CMN_UPD_ID = #{CMN_UPD_ID} WHERE BBI_DOCNO = #{BBI_DOCNO}
update BZ_DATA_ATCH SET BDA_BZSEQNO = #{BDA_BZSEQNO} WHERE BDA_DOCNO = #{BDA_DOCNO} AND BDA_ATCHFILE = #{BDA_ATCHFILE}
update BZ_BBS_INFO a SET a.BBI_SELECT_CNT = (select nvl(max(TO_NUMBER(b.BBI_SELECT_CNT)),'0')+1 from BZ_BBS_INFO b where a.BBI_DOCNO = b.BBI_DOCNO) WHERE a.BBI_DOCNO = #{value}
mapper.delete: delete from BZ_BBS_CMNT where BBC_SEQ = #{BBC_SEQ} and BBC_DOCNO = #{BBC_DOCNO}
delete from BZ_DATA_ATCH WHERE BDA_DOCNO = #{BDA_DOCNO} AND BDA_BZSEQNO = #{BDA_BZSEQNO}
